1.name: Split
1.description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

2.name: Rogue One
2.description: The daughter of an Imperial scientist joins the Rebel Alliance in a risky move to steal the Death Star plans.

3.name: Me Before You
3.description: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

4.name: Suicide Squad
4.description: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

5.name: Deadpool
5.description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

6.name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
6.description: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

7.name: X-Men: Apocalypse
7.description: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.

8.name: Sing
8.description: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists' find that their lives will never be the same.

9.name: Doctor Strange
9.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

10.name: Moonlight
10.description: A chronicle of the childhood, adolescence and burgeoning adulthood of a young, African-American, gay man growing up in a rough neighborhood of Miami.

11.name: Captain America: Civil War
11.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

12.name: Nocturnal Animals
12.description: A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.

13.name: La La Land
13.description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

14.name: Ghostbusters
14.description: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

15.name: Manchester by the Sea
15.description: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

16.name: Hell or High Water
16.description: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

17.name: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
17.description: A father and son, both coroners, are pulled into a complex mystery while attempting to identify the body of a young woman, who was apparently harboring dark secrets.

18.name: Lion
18.description: A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

19.name: Arrival
19.description: A linguist is recruited by the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecrafts land around the world.

20.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
20.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

21.name: The Accountant
21.description: As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client, the Treasury Department closes in on his activities, and the body count starts to rise.

22.name: Hacksaw Ridge
22.description: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

23.name: The Magnificent Seven
23.description: Seven gunmen in the old west gradually come together to help a poor village against savage thieves.

24.name: Moana
24.description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

25.name: Deepwater Horizon
25.description: A dramatization of the disaster in April 2010, when the offshore drilling rig called the Deepwater Horizon exploded, resulting in the worst oil spill in American history.

26.name: Don't Breathe
26.description: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

27.name: Gods of Egypt
27.description: Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.

28.name: Star Trek Beyond
28.description: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.

29.name: Passengers
29.description: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

30.name: Captain Fantastic
30.description: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

31.name: The Girl on the Train
31.description: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

32.name: The Great Wall
32.description: In ancient China, a group of European mercenaries encounters a secret army that maintains and defends the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

33.name: Jason Bourne
33.description: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

34.name: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
34.description: Alice returns to where the nightmare began: The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

35.name: Allegiant
35.description: After the earth-shattering revelations of Insurgent, Tris must escape with Four beyond the wall that encircles Chicago, to finally discover the shocking truth of the world around them.

36.name: Hidden Figures
36.description: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

37.name: Assassin's Creed
37.description: Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar de Nerha and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, before taking on the secret Templar society.

38.name: Kimi no na wa.
38.description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

39.name: Warcraft
39.description: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

40.name: Zootopia
40.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

41.name: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
41.description: When Jacob discovers clues to a mystery that stretches across time, he finds Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. But the danger deepens after he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers.

42.name: The Edge of Seventeen
42.description: High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

43.name: The Nice Guys
43.description: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

44.name: Contratiempo
44.description: While the clock is ticking, with the aid of a witness preparation expert, a successful entrepreneur accused of murder has less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defence.

45.name: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
45.description: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.

46.name: Morgan
46.description: A corporate risk-management consultant must decide whether or not to terminate an artificially created humanoid being.

47.name: Sully
47.description: The story of Chesley Sullenberger, an American pilot who became a hero after landing his damaged plane on the Hudson River in order to save the flight's passengers and crew.

48.name: Below Her Mouth
48.description: An unexpected affair quickly escalates into a heart-stopping reality for two women whose passionate connection changes their lives forever.

49.name: 13 Hours
49.description: During an attack on a U.S. compound in Libya, a security team struggles to make sense out of the chaos.

50.name: Trolls
50.description: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.
